value.title: Power BI Search from Office.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing Search
value.excerpt: Welcome to another interesting Power BI Session on Power BI Search. Now we can search our favorite Power BI reports and dashboards from Office.com, SharePoint Home, and Bing search results. Here in this session, I’m going to explain each step of Power BI search from office.com, SharePoint Home, and Bin

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
